Super bueno y divertido, tiene algunas cosas malas como el hecho de que hay cada vez menos servidores con jugadores activos, pero aún así es genial, es hermoso como cada armas tiene sus detalles y como hay armas específicas para cada clase de jugador y como al tener un modo de juego principalmente enfocado en la toma de banderas es muy importante el trabajo en equipo a diferencia de otros juegos fps cuyo único objetivo es matar por matar
Very awesome, classic WW2 FPS. Spent a bit of time getting used to the weapons and such (similar to classic counter strike) But honestly still better than Day of Defeat Source.
great!

Day Of Defeat - Just Buy Source

I won't give a full in depth review on this game as it doesn't deserve one. To put it into short Day Of Defeat looks ugly, controls horribly, is utterly unfair in so many ways and will rage you. You die in a matter of seconds and run at the same enemies to die every single time. I can't really describe what makes this game so bad other than what I listed above but please if your interested in Day Of Defeat this is not worth it, just buy Day Of Defeat Source, which I also have a review on. Maybe I'll come back and try this again but honestly I did not have a good time with this. 

1/10 ~ Neppy Review

A game that rarely anybody plays now. Good concept except you will need lot of bots to make it come true. 

Pros:
- World War 2, lot of stuff Gold Source has to offer.
- Definitely some detail and bit of soft realism. Machine Guns kick a lot when used without bipod, and weapons like karabiner 98k and M1 Garand kill in one or two shots. 
- Simple class selection that makes you select anything from all sides. 
- Sides do and don't represent the actual history at the same time.

Cons:
- Lot of the good stuff removed in the name of arcade. One example is story-like missions that had cutsceness and maps that were actually lot cooler.
- No low-def models for the passionate old school enthusiants. Did they existed in the first place (considering this game has quite a history behind itself)? Yes. Did the developers bother? No.
- Why the hell is there British side when there's Allied side already? Why seperating it? Did United Kingdom need it's own side? Why don't we play then as Italian or French? And why does it have to be "Axis" against "Allied" when it's a battle led by Nazis against British or Americans in that case? It seems like at the end of the development, developers realised putting Americans straight into an Europe battle in 1940 would be totally against the actual history, so they quickly added British side to counter it, but it doesn't line up with anything else as the rest is mainly US side against Nazis (just like how it was in Day of Defeat's first days).   
- Sides DO and DON'T represent the actual history at the same time. Did I mentioned United Kingdom is a seperate side?

游戏是好游戏 但你像要有好的体验就回到10年前吧 现在开挂的不封 那些傻逼服务器却乱封绿色玩家 说要充会员才能解 你充你妈个大阴逼 服主怎么不回家手冲去 就一个热门的服务器把我给封了 为什么呢 不是开挂而是没有会员 所以别买这个游戏 那么多好玩的fps差你这一个？这个游戏盗版的也可以加服务器 你花20多买一个游戏还要再充会员 我有这钱我买什么游戏不好 要不是打折我买你妈逼 今天想玩就把我封了 我是傻逼

在我觉得没什么可玩的时候我还是会来玩这个游戏，有中文，有国内服务器，不愁没人玩，服务器抵制外挂，有挂可以找线上管理员处理，而且正版玩家可以和盗版玩家一起玩，国内最火的就是蓝海战队服务器，就是那种你都挤不进去的那种火，但是因为我刚买正版，名字默认为p a l y，打死几个会员后，会员以名字为p a l y的玩家怎么能杀人呢？而且他还会把手雷拉环扔地上，计算好时间捡起来再扔出去好在空中爆炸的技巧呢？肯定是挂！他在像管理员告状的时候我就知道我要凉，毕竟人家花了钱买会员，果然蓝海就把我的i p禁止了。搜索d o d蓝海就可以搜到盗版资源，盗版和正版一样可以连机玩的

Day of Defeat - была сделана как мод на Half-Life, в дальнейшем стала самостоятельным проектом. События происходят в период Второй Мировой на Западном фронте. В игре реализованы армии США, Британии и Германии. В свое время к игре было выпущено много обновлений, расширяющих игру. Геймплей игры похож на Counter-Strike 1.6 с примесью Deathmatch из Half-Life. Если вам нравятся такие игры как Half-Life, Counter-Strike и вам нравится стилистика Второй Мировой войны, то игра вам очень понравится. Простой и интересный геймплей не даст вам устать.

Удивительно, но зайдя в 2020 в эту старую, но добротную игру я нашел несколько полных серверов. Онлайн игры 2003 года до сих пор держится на уровне 100-200 человек, на слабых компьютерах можно залипнуть очень надолго.
